sendChatText

public void sendChatText(long nGroupID,
                         long nToUserID,
                         java.lang.String szText,
                         int bussinessType)
Send text content to user.
If nGroupID is 0, means this API as IM API. Otherwise as conference API.
The xml content structure as third parameter szText.

If we only have text context to send, we don't need to add tag TPictureChatItem to xml.
If we only have image or we need to add tag content TTextChatItem to xml content. And call this function, we call sendChatPicture(long, long, byte[], int, int) to send image.
If we have mix content like text and image to send, we need to add tag TTextChatItem and TPictureChatItem. And call this function, we call sendChatPicture(long, long, byte[], int, int) to send image

Parameters:
nGroupID - conference ID
nToUserID - user ID
szText -
< ?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
< TChatData IsAutoReply="False">
    < FontList>
    < TChatFont Color="255" Name="Segoe UI" Size="18" Style=""/>
    < /FontList>
    < ItemList>
        < TTextChatItem NewLine="True" FontIndex="0" Text="这是一个测试"/>
        < TPictureChatItem NewLine="False" AutoResize="True" FileExt=".png" GUID="{F3870296-746D-4E11-B69B-050B2168C624}" Height="109" Width="111"/>
    < /ItemList>
< /TChatData>
bussinessType - 1 as Conference type, 2 as other type
See Also:
#sendChatPicture(long, long, byte[], int, int)}

sendChatPicture

public void sendChatPicture(long nGroupID,
                            long nToUserID,
                            byte[] pPicData,
                            int nLength,
                            int bussinessType)

Send image data to user.

If input 0 as nGroupId, means P2P send data. Before call this API, call sendChatText(long, long, String, int) first

Parameters:
nGroupID -
nToUserID -
pPicData -
|----image header 52 bytes|----------------image data-------------|
|{UUID} extension bytes |----------------image data-------------|
nLength - 52+image size
bussinessType - 1 as Conference type, 2 as other type
See Also:
#sendChatText(long, long, String, int)}
